sv.purpose: To determine the drug treatment to prevent or treat cardiovascular disease.
sv.misuse:
Implementation notes [2019/06/03 JB]
- All rules implemented
- Use of additional specific FHIR profile to have a local placeholder for a boolean variable (FHIR-STU3- Observation.ckd-referral-variable.v0)
- One reconciliation rule added: R4.5.DMRF10. 
- Execution in GDL2 editor works
- [10/01/2019: prepared multilingual support (en/sv/es)]
- [11/01/2019: adaptation to GDL2 Editor v2.3.0 - max(effectiveDateTime)]
- [24/01/2019: include full mappings for CDSM terminologies]
- [25/01/2019: include validated translations for Swedish and Spanish]
- [30/01/2019: include codes for local terminologies]
- [20/02/2019: Correction for READ2 and ICD-10-SE identifiers]
- [10/03/2019: New codes for CVD]
- [16/09/2019: ICD-10-UK (and READ) update for CKD, HF, Diabetes and AF by JB]
- [14/01/2020: Condition of rule R4.5.DMRF10 changed not to fire in case the patient is under any statin (issue 332) by JB]

gt0001.text: Riktlinjer för kronisk njursjukdom och förebyggande och behandling av hjärt-kärlsjukdom
gt0001.description: This guideline service deals with the prevention and treatment of cardiovascular disease in patient with chronic kidney disease.It implements the flowchart '5.4.9. Cardiovascular disease prevention and treatment' of deliverable D7.1 of the C3Cloud project.This flowchart is based on the NICE CKD guideline CG182, Chapter 1.6.16, [60, p. 33-34]. This CDSM accounts for DM-RF reconciliation rules specified in deliverable D7.2 of the C3Cloud project.

gt0047.text: Förebygg och behandla hjärt-kärlsjukdom med orala trombocytaggregationshämmande/antikoagulantia - trombocytaggregationshämmares indikation

gt0048.text: Erbjud trombocythämmande läkemedel för personer med kronisk njursjukdom för sekundär prevention av hjärt-kärlsjukdom, men var medveten om den ökade blödningsrisken.

gt0054.text: Förskriv trombocytaggregationshämmande medel, men var medveten om den ökade blödningsrisken.

gt0056.text: Förskriv trombocytaggregationshämmande medel, men var medveten om den ökade blödningsrisken.

gt0068.text: Förebygg och behandla hjärt-kärlsjukdom med orala trombocytaggregationshämmande/antikoagulantia - Apixabans indikation

gt0069.text: Överväg apixaban före warfarin hos personer med bekräftat eGFR 30-50 ml/min/1,73 m2 och icke-valvulärt förmaksflimmer med en eller flera av följande riskfaktorer: - tidigare stroke eller TIA - ålder 75 år eller äldre -hypertension - diabetes mellitus - symtomatisk hjärtsvikt

gt0078.text: Kontrollera NICE riktlinjer om behandling av förmaksflimmer

gt0079.text: I denna situation med kronisk njursjukdom och förmaksflimmer, se NICE riktlinje för diagnos och behandling av förmaksflimmer [CG180] (https://www.nice.org.uk/guidance/cg180).

gt0084.text: Kontrollera NICE riktlinjer om förebyggande av hjärt-kärlsjukdom inklusive lipidbehandling

gt0085.text: I denna situation med kronisk njursjukdom och innan statiner insätts, se NICE riktlinjer för bedömning och vård av vuxna med hjärt-kärlsjukdom eller risk för detta  [CG181] (https://www.nice.org.uk/guidance/ cg181)

gt0099.text: Erbjud atorvastatin 20 mg för primär eller sekundär prevention av hjärt-kärlsjukdom för personer med kronisk njursjukdom

gt0100.text: Erbjud atorvastatin 20 mg för primär eller sekundär prevention av hjärt-kärlsjukdom för personer med kronisk njursjukdom. Öka dosen om en minskning av icke-HDL-kolesterol på minst 40% inte uppnås (se rekommendation 1.3.28) och om eGFR är 30 ml/min/1,73 m2 eller mer. Förankra användning av högre doser med en njurspecialist om eGFR är mindre än 30 ml/min/1,73 m2.

gt0001.text: CKD Guideline CVD Prevention and Treatment Service
gt0001.description: This guideline service deals with the prevention and treatment of cardiovascular disease in patient with chronic kidney disease.It implements the flowchart '5.4.9. Cardiovascular disease prevention and treatment' of deliverable D7.1 of the C3Cloud project.This flowchart is based on the NICE CKD guideline CG182, Chapter 1.6.16, [60, p. 33-34]. This CDSM accounts for DM-RF reconciliation rules specified in deliverable D7.2 of the C3Cloud project.

gt0047.text: Preventing and treating cardiovascular disease by oral antiplatelets and anticoagulants - antiplatelets indication

gt0048.text: Offer antiplatelet drugs to people with CKD for the secondary prevention of cardiovascular disease, but be aware of the increased risk of bleeding.

gt0054.text: Prescribe antiplatelets, but be aware of the increased risk of bleeding.

gt0056.text: Prescribe antiplatelets, but be aware of the increased risk of bleeding.

gt0068.text: Preventing and treating cardiovascular disease by oral antiplatelets and anticoagulants - Apixaban indication

gt0069.text: Consider apixaban in preference to warfarin in people with a confirmed eGFR of 30-50 ml/min/1.73 m2 and non-valvular atrial fibrillation who have 1 or more of the following risk factors: - prior stroke or transient ischaemic attack - age 75 years or older  - hypertension  - diabetes mellitus - symptomatic heart failure

gt0078.text: Check NICE guideline on atrial fibrillation management

gt0079.text: In this situation of Chronic Kidney Disease and Atrial Fibrillation, check NICE guideline on the diagnosis and management of atrial fibrillation [CG180] (https://www.nice.org.uk/guidance/cg180).

gt0084.text: Check NICE guideline on cardiovascular disease prevention including lipid modification

gt0085.text: In this situation of Chronic Kidney Disease and before using statins, check NICE guideline on the assessment and care of adults who are at risk of or who have cardiovascular disease [CG181] (https://www.nice.org.uk/guidance/cg181)

gt0099.text: Offer atorvastatin 20 mg for the primary or secondary prevention of CVD to people with CKD

gt0100.text: Offer atorvastatin 20 mg for the primary or secondary prevention of CVD to people with CKD. Increase the dose if a greater than 40% reduction in non-HDL cholesterol is not achieved (see recommendation 1.3.28) and eGFR is 30 ml/min/1.73 m2 or more. Agree the use of higher doses with a renal specialist if eGFR is less than 30 ml/min/1.73 m2.

gt0001.text: Tratamiento y prevención de la enfermedad cardiovascular de la Guía para la Insuficiencia renal crónica.
gt0001.description: This guideline service deals with the prevention and treatment of cardiovascular disease in patient with chronic kidney disease.It implements the flowchart '5.4.9. Cardiovascular disease prevention and treatment' of deliverable D7.1 of the C3Cloud project.This flowchart is based on the NICE CKD guideline CG182, Chapter 1.6.16, [60, p. 33-34]. This CDSM accounts for DM-RF reconciliation rules specified in deliverable D7.2 of the C3Cloud project.

gt0047.text: Prevención y tratamiento de enfermedades cardiovasculares por antiagregantes plaquetarios orales y anticoagulantes - indicación antiagregantes plaquetarios

gt0048.text: Ofrezca antiagregantes plaquetarios a las personas con insuficiencia renal crónica para la prevención secundaria de enfermedades cardiovasculares, pero tenga en cuenta el aumento del riesgo de hemorragia.

gt0054.text: Prescriba antiagregantes plaquetarios, pero tenga en cuenta el aumento del riesgo de hemorragia.

gt0056.text: Prescriba antiagregantes plaquetarios, pero tenga en cuenta el aumento del riesgo de hemorragia.

gt0068.text: Prevención y tratamiento de enfermedades cardiovascular por antiagregantes plaquetarios orales y anticoagulantes - indicación Apixaban

gt0069.text: Considere el apixaban en preferencia a la warfarina en personas con un filtrado glomerular confirmado de 30-50 ml/min/1.73 m2 y fibrilación auricular no valvular que tengan uno o más de los siguientes factores de riesgo: - accidente cerebrovascular previo o ataque isquémico transitorio - edad de 75 años o más - hipertensión - diabetes mellitus - insuficiencia cardíaca sintomática.

gt0078.text: Consulte la guía NICE sobre el tratamiento de la fibrilación auricular

gt0079.text: En situación de insuficiencia renal crónica y fibrilación auricular, consulte guía NICE para el diagnóstico y manejo de la fibrilación auricular [CG180] (https://www.nice.org.uk/guidance/cg180).

gt0084.text: Consulte la guía NICE sobre la prevención de la enfermedad cardiovascular, incluyendo la modificación de lípidos

gt0085.text: En situación de insuficienica renal crónica y antes de utilizar estatinas, consulte guía NICE para la evaluación y el cuidado de los adultos que están en riesgo o  tienen enfermedades cardiovasculares [CG181] (https://www.nice.org.uk/guidance/ cg181)

gt0099.text: Ofrezca atorvastatina 20 mg para la prevención primaria o secundaria de  enfermedades cardiovasculares a las personas con insuficiencia renal crónica

gt0100.text: Ofrecer atorvastatina 20 mg para la prevención primaria o secundaria de  enfermedades cardiovasculares a las personas con insuficiencia renal crónica. Aumente la dosis si no se logra una reducción mayor del 40% en el colesterol NO HDL (véase la recomendación 1.3.28) y el filtrado glomerular es 30 ml / min / 1,73 m2 o más.  Acuerde el uso de dosis mayores con el nefrólogo si el filtrado glomerular es inferior a 30 ml / min / 1,73 m2.
